Topic.Title: How do I check the player's cash.

Posts.EditableText: I'm trying to make a vending machine but I can't check the player's money to make sure they have enough... anyone know what to do?
Posts.HTML: I'm trying to make a vending machine but I can't check the player's money to make sure they have enough... anyone know what to do?

I think you want to use the attribute game.pov.money.

For example:

If (game.pov.money >= 2) {
  msg ("You put 造2 in the machine and a " + GetDisplayNameLink (CloneObjectAndMoveHere (banana), "object") + " comes out.")
  game.pov.money = game.pov.money - 2
}
else {
  msg ("You don't have 造2 for the machine.")
}

(Off the top of my head)

Posts.EditableText: It worked thank you very much.
